Posts.Content: Dr. Phil had a woman on the other day that had sent, I think, about $180,000 to someone that she had been emailing to on one of those dating sites.  It was so sad as Dr. Phil pointed out and proved that that person was not real, but, the poor woman didn't totally believe him.  I think she was so far into it financially, that she just didn't want to know that she had been scammed.

Posts.Content: A blood test showed my Vitamin D was low, so, I am on supplements now and really feel better.

Posts.Content: I had the fatigue too, a few weeks in and after I was finished.  Besides having the rads, just going everyday for weeks was wearing enough.  I did find that exercise helped me.  My husband and I would take walks together and I found it energized me a lot. Good luck, Rose
